skills.name: Copyright Docs
skills.description: Generate software copyright design specification documents compliant with China Copyright Protection Center (CPCC) standards. Creates complete design documents with Mermaid diagrams based on source code analysis.
skills.author: CCW Team

skills.name: Project Analyze
skills.description: Multi-phase iterative project analysis with Mermaid diagrams. Generates architecture reports, design reports, and method analysis reports for codebase understanding.
skills.author: CCW Team

skills.name: Software Manual
skills.description: Generate interactive TiddlyWiki-style HTML software manuals with screenshots, API docs, and multi-level code examples for user guides and documentation.
skills.author: CCW Team

skills.name: Workflow Skill Designer
skills.description: Meta-skill for designing orchestrator+phases structured workflow skills. Creates SKILL.md with orchestrator and phase definitions.
skills.author: CCW Team

skills.name: Skill Tuning
skills.description: Universal skill diagnosis and optimization tool. Detect and fix skill execution issues with automated analysis.
skills.author: CCW Team

skills.name: Skill Generator
skills.description: Meta-skill for creating new Claude Code skills with configurable execution modes. Supports analysis and write modes.
skills.author: CCW Team
